name: Idle Isis
description:
Our Dev Team Does Not support Terrorism of ANY KIND domestic or abroad

Our thoughts are with all victims of Terrorism, especially those trapped in Afghanistan, and pray for their well-being.

The purpose of the game is to entertain the player, our research has shown that controversial topics can be more enjoyable. However, we don't want to offend anyone and if you have your doubts/improvements, that you are by all means entitled to, please raise/suggest them in the comments.

Thank You,

gameplay:

Gain cash through attacking (bottom right) or through the income tab

Buy militia using followers and cash - militants will join you during attacks (ammunition is required to supply your militants in battle)

Gain followers each second (currently 10 - will be modified so it you can increase followers per second soon)

Followers can't exceed housing - increase housing via the housing tab

Increase militant battle power through the weaponry tab

access different tabs using the arrows in the left tab.
